Redo Update: Holiday Hours, January Classes, Term 1 Class Bookings, Osteoporosis Worksop & Gift Ideas
‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

Hi Support,


As the holiday season approaches, we want to take a moment to express our gratitude for your support over the past year.


We understand that the festive season can be both joyous and hectic, and it's important to prioritize your health and well-being.


To help you stay on track, we have some important updates and offerings for the holidays.

Holiday Hours & Physiotherapy Availability


During the holiday period, we will be operating with reduced hours, but rest assured, we are still here to help with any physiotherapy needs.


Our team will be available through the Holiday period with the exception of the public holidays, with regular hours resuming on January 6.


If you have any urgent physiotherapy concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out-we're here to help.



December 23 - Regular Hours

December 24 - Brendan and Jane available

December 25 - Closed

December 26 - Closed

December 27 - Brendan and Jane available

December 28 - Closed

December 30 - Regular Hours

December 31 - Jane available

January 1 - Closed

January 2 - Brendan, Jane & Roisin available

January 6 - Back to Regular Hours

Patrick Back in Clinic this Week - From Tuesday December 17


Patrick has returned from this month overseas and his classes will wrap up for the year.


For anyone wanting to book in for a review of their home program or to set them up for exercise program for January he has limited availabity this week.


For those wanting to join his Redo Open Classes in January we recommend you book in for a pre-class assessment if you have any strength goals in mind.


Book with Patrick here for an assesment session.

Holiday Classes Starting January 6


Looking for a way to stay active and energized over the holidays?


Join us for our Holiday Classes starting January 6 until February 1.

  • Melinda: Mondays at 10:45am >> BOOK CLASS
  • Roisin: Wednesday at 12pm >> BOOK CLASS
  • Brendan: Tuesdays 6pm, Thursdays 7am and Saturdays 8am >> BOOK CLASS
  • Patrick: Tuesdays 7am & 930am, Thursdays 1045am and 430pm >> BOOK CLASS

If you are wanting to do multiple classes, please email Brendan and he can send you an invoice for multiple classes (vs booking each class individually).


These classes are designed to keep you feeling great as we ring in the New Year!

Term 1 Class Bookings Now Open


Bookings are now open for Term 1 of our Clinical Exercise Classes, and spaces are filling up fast!


Please note that classes with Melinda and Brendan are largely at capacity. Unfortunately, these classes are not available for booking via our website, so please reply to this email to express your interest in any available vacancies.


Rebuild with Melinda

Mondays at 8:15AM >> BOOK CLASS

Mondays at 10:45AM >> BOOK CLASS


For Level 1 Restore classes with Roisin or our Strength & Conditioning (Refit) and Rebound for Healthy Bones classes, you can book directly via the links below.


Restore with Roisin | Level 1 Clinical Exercise

Mondays at 6:00PM >> BOOK CLASS

Wednesdays at 12:00PM >> BOOK CLASS


Refit Strength with Patrick

Tuesdays at 7:00AM >> BOOK CLASS

Thursdays at 4:30PM >> BOOK CLASS


Rebound for Healthy Bones with Patrick

Tuesdays at 9:30AM >> BOOK CLASS

Thursdays at 10:45AM >> BOOK CLASS

Thursdays at 6:00PM >> BOOK CLASS


Realign Hatha Yoga with Janetta

Wednesdays at 6:00PM >> BOOK CLASS


Reconnect Hatha Yoga with Janetta

Fridays at 10:45AM >> BOOK CLASS


Qigong: Guigen & Shibashi Forms with Adam

Thursdays at 7:15PM >> BOOK CLASS

Fridays at 12:00PM >> BOOK CLASS

Osteoporosis Workshop: January 30


Mark your calendars!


Patrick will be running an informative Osteoporosis Workshop.

When? on Thursday, January 30th, 5:30PM - 7:00PM.


Whether you're managing osteoporosis yourself or just want to learn more, this workshop is a great opportunity to deepen your understanding and get actionable tips for bone health.



Have you been diagnosed with Osteoporosis or Osteopenia?


Do you have a family history of low bone density?


Has your doctor recommended you start Osteoporosis medication, but you are reluctant?


Have you been advised to do strength training for your bone health but don't really know what that looks like?


Are you worried that you will stir up other injuries if you do strength work?



Then join Patrick in this hour and half workshop as he:

  • Explores the principles of strength training with you

  • Explains how this helps to stimulate bone building to help with Osteopenia and Osteoporosis, and

  • Takes you through a practical session.


If you like what you have done in the workshop and it suits your needs, Patrick runs a Rebound for Healthy Bones class during our term of classes @ RedoHealth on Tuesday (930AM) and Thursdays (10:45AM and 6:00PM)


BOOK HERE

Last-Minute Christmas Gift Ideas


Looking for the perfect gift for that special someone? Check out these thoughtful health & wellness gift ideas available at our clinic:

  • Archies Arch Support Thongs - $40 or Slides - $60 (available in a variety of colors and sizes)
  • Dentons Pillows - High Profile, Low Profile, Multi-Profile ($140 or 2 for $240)
  • Spikey or Lacrosse Balls - $15
  • Magnesium Oil - $25 (125ml), $35 (250ml)
  • Bakballs Release Tools - $44

These gifts are ideal for promoting comfort, relaxation, and overall wellness-perfect for anyone looking to take care of their body this festive season!

Wishing You a Healthy, Happy Holiday Season


Thank you for choosing us as your health and wellness partner in 2024.


We wish you a joyful, peaceful, and healthy holiday season. Stay active, rest well, and take care of yourself as you enjoy time with loved ones.


We look forward to seeing you in the New Year, and don't forget to take advantage of our special offers and holiday classes!


Warm regards,


The Team at Redo



Archies come in a range of colors and sizes.


We currently Archies Thongs have a wide selection

Just email Brendan and he can put away your size and color for when you pop in.
